channel.title: Max Payne 3 is alive and still on Brazil
channel.description:
Catch the scans while you still can.
[url]https://forum.xboxworld.nl/showpost.php?p=4203300&postcount=191[/url]
Doesn't look too bad, to be honest and it seems you may still get some missions set in NYC.
Let's give this one the benefit of the doubt.

item.title: Max Payne 3 is alive and still on Brazil
item.dc:creator: Raziel_ZV
item.description:
k3nny1550:

Let’s hope they’re closer to MP2’s- the nightmares there were delightfully bizarre. MP1’s nightmares were just… lame platforming things with blood trails.

I agree with that…but…voice effects were better in MP1 nightmares…I remember a very creepy screaming at one point of the blood trail O_o

Read full topic

item.title: Max Payne 3 is alive and still on Brazil
item.dc:creator: Floyd
item.description:
That’s not my point. I was saying that the noir genre doesn’t depend on rain and darkness.

Read full topic
item.source: Max Payne 3 is alive and still on Brazil

item.title: Max Payne 3 is alive and still on Brazil
item.dc:creator: Faleiro
item.description:
Floyd:

It doesn’t have to be dark, snowy or rainy to be noir, it’s just in the direction and delivery of script, acting, camera angles etc.

I still think I’ll wait for the reviews for this one. No way I’m preordering.

Brazil can be quite rainy, you know.

Read full topic
item.source: Max Payne 3 is alive and still on Brazil

item.title: Max Payne 3 is alive and still on Brazil
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
max payne has sharp textures and nice effects for a 2001 game

I always throw a grenade into the hole in the wall at the start of the 2nd roscoe street lvl, then the rats are armed with desert eagles

I advise you check them out.

item.source: Max Payne 3 is alive and still on Brazil

item.title: Max Payne 3 is alive and still on Brazil
item.dc:creator: Siggs
item.description:
A little touch that I loved; The way the dialogue on exiting kept changing.

[align=center]No amount of painkillers could keep this ache away

I was afraid to go on
But I refused to give in, I had to continue[/align]

One of the many, many, many awesome things about these games. I for one doubt that MP3 can match the Remedy games, but we shall see. It’s promising to see he actually has hair at some point in the game :retard:

Read full topic
item.source: Max Payne 3 is alive and still on Brazil

I like both games …can´t wait for the third

This is blasphemy! This is not Max Payne :’(

item.title: Max Payne 3 is alive and still on Brazil
item.dc:creator: Floyd
item.description:
Thank Christ they decided to keep the voice actor. IIRC when it was first announced, they’d decided to drop the original Max’s voice actor because he didn’t sound old enough. I think they might just have redeemed themselves on this game.
